plot: In this post-apocalyptic web series, a group of refugees struggle for survival in an abandoned theater. Facing dwindling supplies, the group realizes that in order to ensure survival, they must face the monsters outside.
plot_en: In this post-apocalyptic web series, a group of refugees struggle for survival in an abandoned theater. Facing dwindling supplies, the group realizes that in order to ensure survival, they must face the monsters outside.
plot_es: In this post-apocalyptic web series, a group of refugees struggle for survival in an abandoned theater. Facing dwindling supplies, the group realizes that in order to ensure survival, they must face the monsters outside.
title: Exile
